column4: Hi all, I'm trying to get 6.06 LTS to work as a web server. I installed ISPConfig. Somewhere I've seem to have blocked my Firefox from working. Is there a firewall setting that won't let me out, that blocks port 80 or something?

Hi all, I'm trying to get 6.06 LTS to work as a web server. I installed ISPConfig. Somewhere I've seem to have blocked my Firefox from working. Is there a firewall setting that won't let me out, what can I check to find out?
